name: Puzzle Tsubasa
description:
This game is simple game, you can play it easy.

How to play this game :

1. Klik the Shuffle button to start the game

2. klik the picture until same like the picture in the right top

3. You can Pause it, Shuffle it, and Exit it

5. Enjoy the game easy the game.

How to Install

1. Download The Game

2. Install the Apps

3. Klik The Icons Apps

4. Klik Shuffle to Start the game
